comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

Add one of these sentences to main chrome.manifest

manifest jar:myapp.jar/chrome.manifest
manifest ../myapp/chrome.manifest



Actual results:

The contents registered in these manifest are not loaded at all.
